sentences.english: The mallards seemed like the colder it was the better in the pond.
sentences.chinese: 池中野鸭是愈冷愈游得起劲儿。

sentences.english: Male mallard ducks (Anas platyrhynchos) are famous for their long, spiraling genitalia.
sentences.chinese: 雄性绿头野鸭以长长的螺旋状生殖器而著称。

sentences.english: He succeeded in decoying the ducks toward his blind [hide].
sentences.chinese: 他成功地把野鸭引诱到他的隐藏处。

sentences.english: Canada geese and mallard ducks have eaten many of the dead fish。
sentences.chinese: 而这些死鱼中的大部分都被加拿大黑雁与野鸭吃掉了。

sentences.english: It is a natural grazing land. Every early summer, flocks of wild ducks fly here, perching and breeding.
sentences.chinese: 每当夏初，成群的野鸭飞来栖息，繁殖后代。

sentences.english: Then he ran off and soon came to a great marsh where the wild ducks lived.
sentences.chinese: 于是他离家出走，不久就来到一片野鸭住的广阔沼泽。

sentences.english: In the morning the wild ducks flew up to see their new friend.
sentences.chinese: 早上这群野鸭们飞来看他们的新朋友。

sentences.english: rests in his beauty on the water, and the great heron feeds.
sentences.chinese: 美丽的野鸭在湖中安憩，巨大的鹭鸶在觅食。

sentences.english: He decoyed the ducks to an area right in front of the blind.
sentences.chinese: 他把野鸭群诱至诱饵正前方的地区。

sentences.english: Duck, and like them the pigeons, are endowed with steel-like muscles.
sentences.chinese: 野鸭以及与它们相似的鸽子，都长着钢铁般的肌肉。

sentences.english: He peppered the wild ducks with bird shot.
sentences.chinese: 他用鸟枪向野鸭子射击。

sentences.english: In spring they could collect whole baskets of wild duck eggs.
sentences.chinese: 春天里他们可以捡到整篮整篮的野鸭蛋。

sentences.english: He took his rifle to shoot wild duck.
Breed mallard of North America green head to having wide market perspective.
sentences.chinese: 养殖北美绿头野鸭有着广阔的市场前景。

sentences.english: Duck, and like them the pigeons, are endowed with steel-like muscles.
sentences.chinese: 野鸭及与它们相似的鸽子有天赋的钢铁般的肌肉。

(bird species of China) common moorhen (Gallinula chloropus)
(bird species of China) Chinese pond heron (Ardeola bacchus)

(bird species of China) Eurasian teal (Anas crecca)
(bird species of China) common crane (Grus grus)
(bird species of China) taiga bean goose (Anser fabalis)
(bird species of China) black-crowned night heron (Nycticorax nycticorax)
